column1:
$.extend({
	  getUrlVars: function(){
		var vars = [], hash;
		var hashes = window.location.href.slice(window.location.href.indexOf('?') + 1).split('&');
		for(var i = 0; i < hashes.length; i++)
		{
		  hash = hashes[i].split('=');
		  vars.push(hash[0]);
		  vars[hash[0]] = hash[1];
		}
		return vars;
	  },
	  getUrlVar: function(name){
		return $.getUrlVars()[name];
	  }
	});
